calculated_fields.Date Sign:
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
 (if [Max Date Exclude]= [EFFECTIVE_DATE] then 1 else 
    if [MAX_DATE -1day]=[EFFECTIVE_DATE] then -1 else 0 end END)
else if [EFFECTIVE_DATE]= [Parameters].[End Date] then 1 else 
    if [EFFECTIVE_DATE]= [Parameters].[Start Date] then -1 else 0 END END end
calculated_fields.Delta Down T USD 1Y:
case [MARKET_NAME]
when "sUSDMid" then  //Major USD
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "1 Yr" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "1 Yr Swap"
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 end
        +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month" OR ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month Swap"
        THEN 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month Swap"
        THEN 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Month Swap"
        then 3/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "18 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "18 Month Swap"
        THEN 2/4*([Delta Down T USD]+[Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "21 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "21 Month Swap"
        THEN 1/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END

when "sUSOMid" then    //Major USD REPO  Added July 25th 2017
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "4 Month" OR
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "5 Month" OR
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month Swap"OR
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month Swap"OR
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Month" 

        then [Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]  else 0 end


when "USDsUSD12mMid" then    //12m Basis   Added July 25th 2017
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Month" 

        then [Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]  else 0 end

when "USDsUSD1mMid" then if   //1m USD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month Swap"
        then 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month Swap"
        then 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Month" 
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        +
        IF ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Month"
        THEN 3/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) ELSE 0 END
        +
        if ([TERM_LABEL]) = "18 Month"
        then 2/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END
        +
        if ([TERM_LABEL]) = "21 Month"
        then 1/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) ELSE 0 END


when "USDsUSD6mMid" then if //6m USD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month Swap" OR
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Month"  
        then [Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]  else 0 end

when "USDsUSD1dMid" then if  // OIS USD Basis
        ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "6 Month Swap"
        then 1/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "9 Month Swap"
        then 2/3*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Month" OR  ([TERM_LABEL])= "12 Month Swap" or
        ([Risk Date # of Days]>91 and  [Risk Date # of Days]<=365 and  int(right([TERM_LABEL],2)) >=17) //Added for meeting Dates by ADF on 3/16/2018
        then ([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end


        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "15 Month" 
        then 3/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        + 
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "18 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "18 Month Swap"
        then 2/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T])  else 0 end
        +
        if ([TERM_LABEL])= "21 Month" or ([TERM_LABEL])= "21 Month Swap"
        then 1/4*([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END

when "USDsUSDs1dMid" then 
        IF ([Risk Date # of Days]>91 and [Risk Date # of Days]<=365)
        THEN([Delta Down T USD]+ [Fix Value T]) else 0 END


end
calculated_fields.MAX_DATE -1day:
case datepart('weekday',[Max Date Exclude])
when 1 then [Max Date Exclude]-2
when 2 then [Max Date Exclude]-3
else [Max Date Exclude]-1
end
calculated_fields.Date (End Date):
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
    [Max Date Exclude] else [Parameters].[End Date]
end
